metadata.title: CVE-2016-6337 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
MediaWiki 1.27.x before 1.27.1 might allow remote attackers to bypassintended session access restrictions by leveraging a call to theUserGetRights function after Session::getAllowedUserRights.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6337` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.1
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.1').
